snippet: Rupert Murdoch signaled his support for Rick Santorum on the eve of the Iowa caucuses, calling him the "only candidate with genuine big vision" for the United States.
abstract: Rupert Murdoch signaled his support for Rick Santorum on the eve of the Iowa caucuses, calling him the "only candidate with genuine big vision" for the United States.
lead_paragraph: The media mogul Rupert Murdoch signaled his support for Rick Santorum on Monday evening, calling him the "only candidate with genuine big vision" for the United States.

headline.main: Taking to Twitter, Murdoch Signals Support for Santorum
